items.sentence: I didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t need to do that.
I didn\'t know we weren\'t supposed to help Tom.
The police think they caught the guy who did it.
Would you like to see your husband grow a beard?
Would you like to talk about what just happened?
Would you like to visit the White House someday?
Would you mind carrying it up the stairs for me?
I would be grateful if you could do that for me.
I don\'t think that I\'ve ever seen Tom dancing.
Tom is probably not as happy as you think he is.
Tom is probably not as smart as you think he is.
Tom is probably not as young as you think he is.
Tom is probably the oldest person in the office.
Tom is probably thinking about buying a new car.
Don\'t you ever wear any color other than black?
Why do guys care so much about what girls think?
I heard that Tom wanted to go to Boston with us.
I heard that both Tom and Mary have passed away.
I hope Tom feels the same way you do about this.
Tom asked me for something I couldn\'t give him.
